vote.text: Amendment SA 1811 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1811 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4264-4265) To provide for sustainment enhancement.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1811 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1811 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1463.
